data.quote: You can't play life like an untuned instrument and then ask why the music is unpleasent.
data.author: Shaan Ahmed

data.quote: Reality is wrong. Dreams are for real.
data.author: Tupac Shakur

data.quote: Just know that I was once considered just a dreamer... Then I paid my dues and turned so many doubters to believers...
data.author: Big K.R.I.T.

data.quote: Don't let nobody tell you that you can't do it. Love what you do until you don't love it anymore. Nothing's impossible.
data.author: Fetty Wap

data.quote: If you don't build your dream someone will hire you to help build theirs.
data.author: Tony A. Gaskins Jr.

data.quote: I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can’t accept not trying.
data.author: Michael Jordan

data.quote: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far it is possible to go.
data.author: TS Eliot

data.quote: Believe in your dreams and dream big. And then after you’ve done that, dream bigger.
data.author: Howard Schultz, CEO Starbucks

data.quote: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.
data.author: John Quincy Adams

data.quote: Success is not built on success. It’s built on failure. It’s built on frustration. Sometimes its built on catastrophe.
data.author: Sumner Redstone

data.quote: Skills are cheap. Passion is priceless.
data.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

data.quote: I think the thing to do is enjoy the ride while you’re on it.
data.author: Johnny Depp

data.quote: Sometimes you need to push people into the deep for some people will never learn to swim if they've never been taught how it feels to drown
data.author: Shaan Ahmed

data.quote: No one should have the power to shatter your dreams unless you give it to them.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
data.author: Ayn Rand

data.quote: Knowing Is Not Enough; We Must Apply. Wishing Is Not Enough; We Must Do.
data.author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe

data.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
data.author: Lance Armstrong

data.quote: Understanding is the first step to acceptance, and only with acceptance can there be recovery.
data.author: J.K. Rowling

data.quote: Mistakes are the portals of discovery.
data.author: James Joyce
